description: The main table for Lab Anatomic Pathology cases. It contains mostly items that do not change much over time.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case record.

columns.name: CASE_ACCESSION_DTTM
columns.description: The instant that the case was accessioned. Currently, 'accessioned' means the time when the case is first accepted in Case Builder.

columns.name: CASE_RECEIVED_DTTM
columns.description: The instant that the case was received.  This is equivalent to the instant when the first specimen on the case was received.

columns.name: CASE_OVERDUE_DTTM
columns.description: The instant when the case is considered overdue.  This is equivalent to the Case Accession Instant plus the Case Expected Length.

columns.name: CASE_GROUPER_ID
columns.description: Stores the Requisition Grouper record ID that this case is linked to.

columns.name: CASE_PAT_CONTACT
columns.description: Stores the patient contact that this case is linked to.

columns.name: CASE_LAB_ID
columns.description: Stores the laboratory associated with this case.

columns.name: DATE_ENTR_DT
columns.description: Stores the date the case was created.

columns.name: CASE_COLL_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the case was first collected.

columns.name: CASE_SIGNOUT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the case was completely signed out.

columns.name: CONTAINER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the tracking container associated with this case record.

columns.name: CASE_TASK_ADD_DTTM
columns.description: The latest date and time when a task was added to the case.

columns.name: INSTANT_PAT_ASSOC_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when the patient was associated with the case.

columns.name: CASE_SUBSPECIALTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The subspecialty category identifier for the case.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: LAST_TASK_ADDED_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The last date and time in UTC that a task was added to this case.

columns.name: CASE_ACCESSION_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time that the case was accessioned, in UTC
